Detailed Description

The display class for entrie based modules.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CHTMLEntryDisplay::CHTMLEntryDisplay ( )

The constructor of CHTMLEntryDisplay.

This is the constructor of CHTMLEntryDisplay. It initializes the members and creates the objects we need to create the required HTML formatted text.

CHTMLEntryDisplay::~CHTMLEntryDisplay ( ) [virtual]

The destructor of this display object.

Member Function Documentation

char CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display ( SWModule & module ) [virtual]

Renders the current entry of the module using HTML tags.

The rendered text is cached so it's faster if it's called for the same key next time.

Reimplemented in CHTMLChapterDisplay.

QString CHTMLEntryDisplay::getHTML ( ) const

This function returns the last looked up HTML text.

Call this with false as argument to switch off the headers (module anme and current position).
